metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for productivity workflows - skills, agents, commands, and hooks

plugins.name: commit
plugins.description: Git workflows: worktrees, branches, and commit organization

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Core workflows: TDD, verification, brainstorming - essential capabilities always loaded

plugins.name: debug
plugins.description: Systematic debugging: root cause analysis, defense-in-depth validation, log correlation, and distributed systems troubleshooting

plugins.name: doc
plugins.description: Documentation: API docs, tutorials, memos, architecture guides, Mermaid diagrams

plugins.name: meta
plugins.description: Plugin development: writing skills, testing skills, marketplace analysis

plugins.name: python
plugins.description: Modern Python 3.12+ development with uv, ruff, pydantic, FastAPI, Django and production-ready practices

plugins.name: review
plugins.description: Code review workflows: requesting reviews, receiving feedback, review best practices

plugins.name: shell
plugins.description: Shell scripting toolkit with Google Style Guide refactoring and Unix man page expertise

plugins.name: testing
plugins.description: Testing patterns: anti-patterns to avoid, condition-based waiting for async tests

plugins.name: workflow
plugins.description: Planning and execution workflows: plans, subagents, git worktrees, branch completion

plugins.name: agentic-workflow
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration with anti-abandonment patterns - Explore, Plan, Delegate, Verify, Synthesize
